sqlMap.select: select ap.DES_AGEN_PROMOTORA as desAgenPromotora, ap.DES_ACC_PROMOCION as desAccPromocion, ap.DES_PUBLICO_OBJ as desPublicoObj, ap.DES_FORM_ACTIV as desFormActiv, ap.DES_PRODUCTO_REL as desProductoRel from VMCDBA.INF1ACCION_PROMOCION ap where ap.ID_OCEX = #idOcex# and ap.NUM_PERIODO_TRIM = #numPeriodoTrim# and ap.ID_TIPO_ACCION = #idTipoAccion#
